text: Ioannis Kourkourikis (born 5 March 1971) is a Greek rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Greece Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Giannitsa
title: Ioannis Kourkourikis
